sql-select.name: GetTablesWithUniqueIdentifierColumn
UniqueIdentifier with NewId
sql-select.description: Find columns where the primary key is based on NewId()
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSCOL.[name] AS [ColumnName] ,tST.[name] AS [ColumnTypeName] ,tSC.[text] AS [ColumnDefault] ,tSIND.[OrigFillFactor] AS [ObjectIndexFillFactor] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysindexes] tSIND ON tSIND.[id] = tSO.[id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysindexkeys] tSIK ON tSIK.[id] = tSIND.[id] AND tSIK.[indid] = tSIND.[indid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] tSCOL ON tSCOL.[id] = tSIK.[id] AND tSCOL.[colid] = tSIK.[colid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[systypes] tST ON tST.[xtype] = tSCOL.[xtype] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscomments] tSC ON tSC.[id] = tSCOL.[cdefault] WHERE tSO.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSIND.[status] & 16 = 16 AND tST.[name] = N'uniqueidentifier' AND tSIK.[keyno] = 1 AND tSIND.[OrigFillFactor] = 0 AND tSC.[text] LIKE '%newid%' ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSCOL.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSCOL.[name] AS [ColumnName] ,tST.[name] AS [ColumnTypeName] ,tSDC.[definition] AS [ColumnDefault] ,tSIND.[fill_factor] AS [ObjectIndexFillFactor] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[indexes] tSIND ON tSIND.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[index_columns] tSIDXC ON tSO.[object_id] = tSIDXC.[object_id] AND tSIND.[index_id] = tSIDXC.[index_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] tSCOL ON tSCOL.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] AND tSCOL.[column_id] = tSIDXC.[column_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[types] tST ON tST.[user_type_id] = tSCOL.[user_type_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[default_constraints] tSDC ON tSDC.[parent_object_id] = tSO.[object_id] AND tSDC.[parent_column_id] = tSCOL.[column_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] IN ( N'USER_TABLE' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSIND.[is_primary_key] = 1 AND tST.[name] = N'uniqueidentifier' AND tSIND.[fill_factor] = 0 AND tSDC.[definition] LIKE '%newid%' ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSCOL.[name] ;
